Html:
I need a  DropDownCheckBoxes for SharePoint 2007 Web Part.  I am able to add it to the project, However the Control Does not DropDown and It appears Disabled.

Please let me know if Web parts are support.

BTW Nice Controls.

 

thanks

You have to include it in your package in the solution explorer.  Otherwise, the dll won't be included in the package when you build it.  This maybe the the cause of your problem.  Right click on the "Package" node in Solution Explorer and click on View Designer.  Look Below for "Advanced".  This will let you add a 3rd party dll with your Sharepoint solution.  This is also the section where you can package icons, files, and folders with your webpart solution.

 

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/7521697/include-3rd-party-dll-in-the-sharepoint-project-while-packaging-the-wsp
